# Implementation Plan: User Authentication

## Technical Context

**Language/Version**: TypeScript 5.x
**Primary Dependencies**: Express, Passport.js
**Storage**: PostgreSQL
**Testing**: Jest, Supertest
**Target Platform**: Node.js 20+
**Project Type**: web-backend
**Performance Goals**: Response time under 200ms
**Constraints**: Must work with existing user table
**Scale/Scope**: Small team, MVP

## Constitution Check

- [x] Quality First - Tests included
- [x] TDD Required - Test specs will be generated
